name: TheAtlantic
text: "Teachers signed up to be a positive adult presence in children’s lives, and to help them grow up with their peers, at school, away from home. We need them to follow through, even though it’s a challenge," Kristen McConnell writes: https://t.co/HJPB8WaLPQ

name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen to Senator Chris Coons discuss a Civilian Conservation Corps for the pandemic era on the "Social Distance" podcast. https://t.co/ob0g1S0Bji

name: TheAtlantic
text: Los Angeles has an ambitious program to use tree-planting as an axis to connect job-creation, climate sustainability, urban renewal, and economic equity and inclusion, @JamesFallows writes: https://t.co/RH0TqAWoJT

name: TheAtlantic
text:
One year ago, India revoked Kashmir’s autonomous status, throwing the region into lockdown.

“It wasn’t always a bad relationship with the army,” a young Kashmiri told @anchalvohra last fall. “Now I see them as an enemy." https://t.co/S6QY5kmmwG

name: TheAtlantic
text: Donald Trump has revealed the depths of the country’s prejudice and forced Americans to reckon with a racist system, writes @DrIbram: https://t.co/glTmzZl3Xe

name: TheAtlantic
text: “For the first time in a long time, I don’t think it really makes sense for me to have children; the future is too uncertain and the current environment too unsafe,” writes @TheSamhita: https://t.co/LPbqEEhDte

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @JaniceWolly: Why have one powerful cover story per issue when you can have two? Here’s the second for September, and it’s well worth your time: https://t.co/hK0dehRFI2

name: TheAtlantic
text: The human immune system is very complicated. (No, seriously, it's really very complicated.) And it's the key to answering some of the most pressing questions about how the pandemic will play out over the next months and years, @edyong209 writes: https://t.co/8lhBuwaw7M

name: TheAtlantic
text: "As every experienced federal prosecutor would immediately understand, Barr’s position violates Department of Justice lawyers’ training, their obligations to the court ... and the equal application of the law to all," @AWeissmann_ writes: https://t.co/6YAgeHqmfm

name: TheAtlantic
text: "A great many people seem to think Trader José is just a little joke, rather than a bark of white supremacy," @JohnHMcWhorter writes: https://t.co/CHdoZ8V2bt

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Should Joe Biden overcome these obstacles, as well as Trump’s inevitable attempts to cheat, and win the presidency, he simply must devote his political capital to tackling the process issues that eluded the last Democratic president," @SaradaPeri writes: https://t.co/LRxQDPUCX0

name: TheAtlantic
text: Throughout the pandemic, experts have recommended socializing outdoors. So what happens in the winter? @jpinsk reports: https://t.co/2gRXTbDzVy
